answerText: nitrogen [or N][10] Amines can also be generated by reduction of this functional group. This functional group can be formed from dehydration of amides and is hydrolyzed by acid into a carboxylic acid.

subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this element which is bonded to at least one alkyl group in an amine.
